column4: You need to edit /etc/gdm/gdm.conf file. Login to Virtual Console, using Ctrl+Alt+F2, and login there. Then, type /etc/gdm/gdm.conf and there's a line (271) that says '[xdmcp]', a few lines below that, there's a line 'Enable=false'. My guess is that your gdm.conf has 'Enable=true', so perhaps changing that line might solve your problem.
Can you log in to your System?
